website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction towards the Fresh Foam Arishi Trail has been mostly positive, though some significant issues might mar its capacity to maintain its pedigree. This trail version of the original Arishi retains its comfort and versatility level while equipping it with elements to handle the terrains.Fans of New Balance running shoes can enjoy this trail-optimized offering of the Fresh Foam Arishi line.
pros: Several consumers have stated that the weight of the New Balance Fresh Foam Arishi Trail is suitably light for long-term use
The aesthetics of this trail running shoe are welcomed by those who like cool-looking trail apparel
The cushioning system is welcomed because of its apparently supportive nature
Some purchasers have stated that the outsole unit is able to deliver reliable traction on a variety of surfaces
According to some users, the upper has protective elements that shield against sharp objects and irregular surfaces
cons: A few consumers have mentioned that the forefoot section has a tendency to uncomfortably bunch the toes together
The collar irritatingly rubs against the ankles, based on a couple of reviews

customer_reviews.title: Trail shoe NOT, Tiki Bar shoe yes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing New Balance for 15 years, over 40 pairs, 3 recent purchases in the last month, and this is my first BAD review. I have been hiking mountain trails and walking trails for decades. This shoe should never be on on trail, maybe in a Tiki bar with tropical shirt, as the shoe is fashionable. I just took a 2 mile flat terrain walk, shoes lack support, cushioning, rub against the ankles and hurt the top of one foot. I got this at a steep discount so I will hold onto them for the summer Tiki bar crowd, but NO ONE should purchase these as trail or running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Serpico322

customer_reviews.title: Bad heel
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the cushioning on this shoe isn't the best. One, just one, of the heels isn't quite as padded as the other, so I have one heel that is rubbed raw while the other is fine. I cannot return because after my first walk with these shoes I accumulated quite a bit of blood on the left heel. You can look at my past reviews; I don't write bad reviews. However, I feel everyone should be aware who is considering buying these shoes. I've had new balance in the past that worked just fine, so this one pair may have been a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Allthingstennessee

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet, low on cushion
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide toe box. (Thank you so much, New Balance!!! You have been so good to us wide feet weirdos over the years. ) The tread seems decent and rugged, but I’m just getting past snow melt and can try rock scrambling soon. I was a bit disappointed in the amount of cushioning, but I suppose it’s to be expected with a trail shoe. I’m not going to be using them for any road runs, and may have issues with just running the mile on roads to get to the trails. I bought another pair of NB cushion shoes, and they are like buttah for my feet when I run on roads.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gaidis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Trail Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Firm. Lightweight. Great traction on mixed dirt/rock/grass trails. Toe protect works well as I stubbed my toe on a rock that would have been painful in my street running shoes. Nice for walks but was encouraged by the light weight and traction of the shoes to incorporate sprints on the trail. A solid buy if you can find it on sale for a little over $40. Others compliment the shoes ability to cater to a wide foot - but the regular size 10 fit like a regular size 10 - not too wide and I have a LV foot. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for walking/running in
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look cool, as well as it is very comfortable. Its also very sturdy and nicely stitched together. I wear a size 13 and usually get a size 13 wide when I purchase New Balances. This time I opted for just the size 13 to see if there was any difference. I noticed that these were a little tight width wise when I first put them on; taking the strings out and re-stringing them helped greatly. The shoes are very comfortable and feel durable enough for me to start walking and working out in. I highly recommend them and think that I may get another pair in a different color and with a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: R. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: After wearing NB all my life this is the first pair that I would say was just cheaply made and would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chopemupgood

customer_reviews.title: good price point and great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an inexpensive trail running shoe for quite some time. This one checks all the boxes - price, fit, durability and is good for rain, mud, gravel etc. Big fan of New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Furnace

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of running shoes after returning another pair that were too small. I have a wide foot and for years could only wear New Balance because they made an extra-wide athletic shoe. This pair, as well as the last ones, are labeled extra wide but they are not. These are being returned as well. I am not sure what has happened with their manufacturing but something has changed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: aexeter

customer_reviews.title: Xc Runner
customer_reviews.text: I run xc in high school, I'm not the fastest averaging about 22min. But these are not bad for that. They are beefy so don't expect them to be nice. The wear is not bad. And have plenty of traction on grass, dirt and clay. One of the cons however are that the heals do dig in after a while. But for the low low price of 25 I got it for (new). They are well worth it. And hey if they don't work for running, daily drive them in to the ground. Its for 25$ you cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: New Balance running sneaker not what I thought :(
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker is ok feel a little substandard for New Balance not alot of support when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nike guy converted to a New Religion NB
customer_reviews.text: As an old Nike guy, giving the price tag, design, comfort and the conformity of the shoes meets my needs. Not the most comfortable pair in my experience, but I switched to high priced Nike to NB which run true size. I wore my first NB running shoes for four years. Now I’m stuck w it. It was time to purchase a new pair before my head toe pop up off the front stitch :)
customer_reviews.author: okay ilkiz

customer_reviews.title: Update: so SQUEAKY!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I took one star away, and gave them a 4. They are fairly comfy, but they are the squeakiest shoes inhave ever owned. They have squeaked since day one. Just leaning forward, and adjusting your body weight forward make them squeak. Got these for work shoes. Need something more comfy to be on my feet 12 hours a day. Gonna find out how they work starting tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for all activities
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of NB FF Arishi's. I have a wide foot so the fit is important to me for everyday wear plus cardio & training. Having a 13 4E width is hard to find good looking shoes that also fit well....these are it. The Arishi's seem to run a little to the loose side width wise which is great for me but they're pretty true to size length wise so the 13 is true to 13. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard but well made.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I’m a couple months in and these have really broken in quite nicely. I’ll leave my original review as follows, however now these have become a better shoe to me and I added a star to reflect that. /// The foam is hard and the heel area is uncomfortable. The shoes seem extremely durable but you need to understand that the foam on the bottom is hard as a rock, maybe some kind of comfort insert could help.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on buying these because they were cheap without expecting much from them. I’m blown away by how comfortable and lightweight they are! They were supposed to be a backup pair for summer hiking but have instantly been promoted to my primary pair. I can’t speak to their durability yet but even if they don’t last they’re worth the cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are for men but i couldn’t find a cool color in the women’s section so I ordered a size 7 since I’m 8-8.5 in US women’s size. . It fits perfectly and are very lightweight. I went shopping and walked a lot in them and they were so nice. I’m not sure how it’ll hold up when I start doing more exercise in them but so far I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Sisi

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout/Walking Soles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because only New Balance seems to understand that wide shows need to be more than labeled wide, they need to be wider from the footbed to the top of the lacing arch. Nice shoes, although I know I'll "kill" them in only a few months. While I'm wearing them (like right now), I almost forget they're there. A far cry from the shoes you can't wait to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Too small. No padding. This is not a great shoe for me. Back to amazon fast
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect
customer_reviews.text: These are listed as trail runners, and look like it in the photos. Yet they have no support, the soles are too flexible, and the material is way too light for anything more than mall walking. I will keep these for loafing shoes or when I want to impress the city dwellers as I’m hoofing down a sidewalk. These are just look alike slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bodman

customer_reviews.title: No cushion on the heel!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, but the heel digs really bad at first. I had to play with the tightness of the shoe lace to get the conform just right. Wearing these for 10 hours a day is killer on my heels. Had to put bandages on my heels the first few days. Thought about sending these back, but they are more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Accurate size
customer_reviews.text: Showed up exactly what I selected i.e. extra wide. So far the only shoes that matched the description and size. I can't claim all buyers will get what they purchased but I ended up with the accurate order. No irritation from the tongue nor the heel and is light enough for any running conditions.
customer_reviews.author: neophyte226

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a higher Quality shoe 🤷🏾‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work (Amazon Delivery Driver) so you could imagine the amount of walking and running up apartment stairs I do moving 200-300 packages each route. These are okay comfort wise I don’t recommend these in rainy weather because your feet will be SOAKED. The “N” is peeling off the sides of both shoes it’s clear New Balance didn’t care quality wise with these. I give them 3 out of 5. Even though I’ll end up spending a little more I’ll be Going with Adidas or Nike next time.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for running and some everyday travel and they get the job done. The break in was a little painful from the first day. The arch support was a little less then my other shoes so the first run was a little rough but after getting used to them they work well and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Sides of shoes too hight
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pairs of New Balance sneakers. The first three were "Gobis." Those fit well. But these damn "Arishis" are made too high on the sides below my ankles and cut into my ankles. I purchased orthopedic lifts at the drug store to raise my feet up a little but no luck. Then I used a pair of wire cutters to trim the sides down but that did not work either. I am disappointed. I still like New Balance, just not this model.
customer_reviews.author: Artful Dodger

customer_reviews.title: Just ok shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price but hate the non comfort back support. I had to apply Vaseline as the back of the shoe’s not cushioned and rubs you not in a good way. The shoes look nice but I also added a foam insole for more cushion. They’re kinda flat in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Christ

customer_reviews.title: Fit true-to-size; but extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I go for New Balance because they offer extra-wide options in pretty much all sizes. These shoes fit spot-on like most other New Balances. I would not say that they're "cheaply made" as other reviews suggest; but the construction by the ankle is very hard, very high, and caused horrible chafing within fifteen minutes. Either commit to knee socks and gritting your teeth, or do yourself a favor and find a more comfortable pair.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Griswold

customer_reviews.title: For looks only, not slightly supportive
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always loved new balance shoes. These were the most uncomfortable pair he's ever had. They rubbed the side of his ankle in a way that made them impossible to work out in. They were way too thin to be supportive. They looked nice so if you're just wearing them for looks I guess they'd be alright but if plan on walking at all, good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: SydneyB

customer_reviews.title: My last purchase from New Balance
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of new balance shoes I've purchased. Unfortunately the third time is not the charm. I bought the extra wide size because I'm a 4E. The width was what it needed to be. My only complaint is the heel of the shoes. They dig into my ankles after a short time wearing them. Close to an hour. I don't have fat ankles either. For what this is advertised as, I don't think it will work so well. I couldn't imagine actually running in these.
customer_reviews.author: jared heath

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for work. I’m on my feet thirteen hours a shift and have found these to be comfortable with good arch support. I bought three pair. Two to use on alternating nights at work and one for everyday use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C. Swanger

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well made for the price. Good for running but doesn't grip well on wet surfaces so I wouldn't recommend it for applications such as roofing or any other construction. But for every day purposes it's a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Damian N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes has been holding up through my 8 hour shifts so far. I'd recommend these shoes since they feel comfortable and light on my feet. I'll update my review if the shoes doesn't last long, but for now I'm impressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, horrible feel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting and looking shoe, however their is almost no cushion around the ankle. Feels horrible when walking in it, and rubs bad. If they put more cushion in the next version, it will be great. Donating these.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.  No padding
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe because I really like New Balance and love to run trails. Thought the foam would feel quite good on the rocky trail. After my second run, the foam cushioning was gone. I can feel every rock under my feet. Also, I am quite disappointed at the lack of ankle support. Overall, this is just a really cheap shoe. Do not buy this if you like to run trails.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A DeSena

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, loving it every moment of it. First time trying to buy shoes from Amazon and I am highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anupam Pandit

customer_reviews.title: Great style, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! These new balances fit very well and I really like the style. I would recommend these shoes to anybody who likes New balance shoes
customer_reviews.author: Pslayer85

customer_reviews.title: Wide is not wide
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow to even be close to being "extra wide". I should have returned them when I got them, but stupidly wore them for a shift at work. I wouldn't consider my feet monstrously wide, but the are wider than the sole of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Vox White

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: My previous shoes were the same brand and three times the price so I was slightly skeptical but these have quickly become my favorite shoes. I walk 3 plus miles per day and they barely look worn and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald McLane

customer_reviews.title: Not your dads New balances!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn, Period. Aside from being a great hiking/trail running shoe. They offer great support, if you have wide feet your feet will love you because there is so much room when you get a wide version of the shoe. Also they are great looking! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: At the beginning they were good...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for biking, running, trail, cutting lawn, etc. After awhile the hard piece on the back support started to rub through to the back of my ankle. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for working out, and trail running. No padding around ankles, runs really bad. Order the wide even if you don't have a really wide foot, these shoes seem really slim. These shoes make my feet want to drop inward when I walk or stand. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but I had to add arch supports as they are made more for flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: The shoe had no arch support and my feet would roll in (over pronation) when my heel touched the ground. Gave me knee and back pain. I never had a problem with NB befote?
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: New balance
customer_reviews.text: They fit like all my 9.5 new balance shoes fit. They are firmer than I wanted, I was hoping for something like the NB Cruz’s except with a little nicer toe covering. All in all a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FOR WALKING/RUNNING
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are giving my feet the the worst blisters. Also there’s a class action on the effects of super soft foam like NB Fresh foam. Huge regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Good Outside Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought shoes online but this worked out great. Fantastic first experience. I’ve used these to go hiking and I’ve had no issues for the past few months now. The glue can be seen on the toes of the shoe but it’s no big deal since I use these for running and other outside activities.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price and size!
customer_reviews.text: A size 15 man shoe!! I was ecstatic to find these in a 15 wide! My husband is a big and tall guy so these shoes are a life saver. No store carries over size 13 these days!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kemp

customer_reviews.title: not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: the extra wide 4e is about as wide as a normal nike. not what i would expect from new balance. the 623's in comparison are at least 1/4" wider
customer_reviews.author: Preston Arning

customer_reviews.title: light weight workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: Light on the feet, comfortable w/ average support expected with light-weight running or workout shoes. They look good and could wear easily right away.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: They fit my husband great. He has wide freet and a condition that effects all the bones in his feet since birth and he says these sneakers fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peverill

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Both of us wear mostly new balance 4e wide shoes. They always fit great for big guys with wide feet. My son's opinion is that "it feels good to run in them."
customer_reviews.author: Syrus P. Bingman

customer_reviews.title: Great jogger
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, light, stylish. Easy to break in. Breathable. Can’t beat it for the price. Not the most savvy support, but better than most running shoes at this level. Not a full time training shoe, but good for a jog
customer_reviews.author: N8material

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, good traction, fits as expected, but poor insoles
customer_reviews.text: Shoe delivers as advertised, but the insole is rubbish providing neither support nor cushioning. They are well priced but figure another $10-20 for decent insoles.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Not enough foam on the sole but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Half a number big but very comfortable and breathable. I keep the pair since they’re for work but other a second pair in a different color half a size smaller and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Iransirijillo

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and durable. Love the New Balance brand and this model is no exception. Reflective N on both sides, and full rubber sole. Great shoe for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony McDaneldTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of New Balance, very comfortable to wear, the color is great, I really like the color, it's kinda like walking on a cloud, to be honest, not hard to break in at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: If this was actually a ew balance shoe I’m dissapointed. Not the quality I have come to expect from new balance. It’s time to find a new brand of tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Kids like them
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes fit pretty good and my kid loves them, has been using them since we got them. This is his preferred pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cowwyhippoandbubu

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He has really wide feet across his toes. NB are one of the only brands that fit him comfortably. So far he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELIQUE OLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Good value trail shoe, made better for me by aftermarket insoles
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this trail shoe. My main two critiques which are purely individual to my feet is the mid foot lock down is not quite what I need it to be. Also the soles are much thinner than I anticipated. After first rocky trail run I ordered a pair of insoles that were ~5mm: made both problems much better.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: There ok
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shoe. Thought they would be super comfortable for New Balance. Not the greatest in support either. I were them just not all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Scheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Tongue material not like my previous NB Fresh Foam Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is like stiff canvas, curling as I run. It creates a “rope-like” crease making for a very uncomfortable rubbing action. My blister (see picture) is at least a 1/4 in. This is after my first run. My previous NB fresh foam had a padded tongue. I would like a refund; 1 week after return period closed!
customer_reviews.author: KalaKoa

customer_reviews.title: The worst pair of NB I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I was in disbelief the NB could make such an inferior product. Flimsy, deformed, no support, and the list goes on and on.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: NO- balance!
customer_reviews.text: With out Question these are NOT worth $60.00 Plus! These sneakers should be priced at $39.99 at most. The 9 1/2 were a tad to big and exchanged them for a 9. It was until I worn them for a day that I took noticed of how low budget they are and awful feel/support. I decided to keep them for my lawn work and running to Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe xtra wide because of my wide feet and it fits like a glove. My feet hurts and I can’t wear it for more than a minute. It feels like the shoe was cheaply made. I’ve bought new balances in store but this one feels like it’s a knock off. I just threw 75 dollars away. You will be disappointed if you buy theses shoes. BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but short lived.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable for my wide feet. I was walking an average of 6-8 miles a day on the road and they lasted less than 2 months before the tread wore down. Just keep that in mind, the milage isn't high on these but neither is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort and softness of the sole. The upper tongue seems a bit cheaper that most NBs I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding heels
customer_reviews.text: Literally after buying these and leaving the post office while wearing them, my heels started bleeding within 10 minutes. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK. I should have listened to the numerous reviews on the lack of support and such. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE AS I DID.
customer_reviews.author: kevinxu523

customer_reviews.title: Early wear
customer_reviews.text: After only two days of running the soles are already wearing down! Not good quality. Also NB must have changed the height of the shoe because my ankle hits the top side? Maybe I should have gone for the higher priced shoe?
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. Shoes are even better in person. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: First time to buy New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson. He says they are real comfortable. They price was also reasonable...which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Visual

customer_reviews.title: Allow time to get used to them
customer_reviews.text: Pro: great for wide feet. Con: the heel sits in a cup. Just an odd feeling. Takes time to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Chad H.

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the shoe, more of a canvas shoe, meaning material is thin. I like them and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky & Phil

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.text: They're cool. My feet breath. Lightweight. Awesome tread if you're outdoors, not so much if you're indoors
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Misleading -not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I expected the shoes to feel like I was waking on a cloud, the similar feeling to the Skechers brand. However in these shoes I can actually feel the ground. Not comfortable at all for running. I was hoping for more of a push-back once my feet hit the pavement - nothing. Don’t waste my your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit too tight and the toes where too NARROW making the use of these shoes VERY uncomfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario R. Erneta

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep. NB shoes fit me well. My trail running days are behind me but, I still like to hike trails in my area. One particular trail is very rocky with tree roots etc. The toe guard and stiff sole on this shoe make hiking a rocky trail very easy and pain free!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yr old son loves the comfort of his new shoes. He says they are lghtweight but they do not feel cheap at all. I have always been a fan of newbalance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fit perfect, great traction!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and lightweight! Perfect fit for my teenager, loves the colors and traction
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Biasiucci

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were not quite wide enough was given a complete refund. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Denny Stamps

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the looks, but end up loving the way they feel. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Coloma

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: disappointed. Very little padding on the heel and around the ankle, making it dig into your skin They feel very cheap and thin. The sole is stiff and awkward. Will return. i got the 10 4e. and they are still narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Odell

customer_reviews.title: Light & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to run and get in shape for soccer. He said they are comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picked the shoe up for ~$36 and it fits great, has great sole support and looks stylish. So what are you waiting for??
customer_reviews.author: Chill_Snow

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable but they run on the small size very small actually, the left shoe fits too small. They are not even size. At the beginning I thought they would stretch but after 2 weeks they are still very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I have wide feet and these are comfortable and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, as always they feel good and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: wiuser

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lightweight show. Doesn't have an overabundance of padding, but that is not a big deal for me. I have wide feet and this fits well. Seems pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.author: John T Steinbrunner

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a family member. When asked how the fit for a person who has a wide foot I was told extremely comfortable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: R Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice/inexpensive shoe. Great shoe to have for walking around. Nothing to fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Zach W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe for running. It’s flat surface feels like you’re gliding. Good construction with good materials that seem like they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Eventhough it's extra wide, it doesn't look like an orthopedic shoe. Very stylish with the comfort needed.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are a good shoe for the price and they are comfortable. Only complaint i have is there isnt enough curve in them for my feet so ill have to put insoles in.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Laycock

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, great for casual use in all terrain, this is my weekend shoe of choice
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I'm out of my dress shoes I'm into these 5 days per week. First thing in the morning on Saturday these are on and don't come off until after sundown. I use them for everything except running (I hate running) and this is the best shoe I've owned in years.
customer_reviews.author: BenBenBen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This my second pair, I love them so much I wore them out
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Wider than normal
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot but these are very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Refund of returned item
customer_reviews.text: Reurned these items at UPS last April 27, Hoping to get a refund this week.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made never buy these again!!! And to small for size 12!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as hoped and was really comfortable, my only complaint is that I wish the mesh were a bit thicker and tougher because I've already worn a hole in the side of one of them after a few months worth of working. I'm rough on shoes though so it was to be expected. All in all, a good and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: The tounge of the shoe folds up very easily.It is real thin.
customer_reviews.author: oldwagon

customer_reviews.title: Laces are fraying already.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that after two wear, the laces are fraying. It’s making me think I got a pair of knock-offs. Kindly replace the set of laces. Thank you. Attached is a photo.
customer_reviews.author: JS
